EmailTemplate.description: Sending other life event form to requestors
EmailTemplate.name: Life Event Change - Other
EmailTemplate.subject: Life Event Change Form
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting SunPower about changing the status of your solar lease.
What You Can Expect: Due to Military Relocation for Service
Once we receive the attached document, the lessee must submit a copy of the military order. Deferment on the lease will be processed for the time the lessee is on military lease. Payments will be suspended and will be rescheduled to the end of the lease term.
What You Can Expect: Due to Separation of Lessee/Divorce
Once we receive the attached document, both parties will receive a Separation of Lessee Form to complete and sign. This confirms that both parties agree to change the name on the lease. The party who is assuming the lease will receive an email from SunPower with a credit check/identity verification application. This application is mandatory and must be completed by the party to assume the lease. Once the party's credit application is submitted and processed, we will prepare an amendment document that both parties must sign.
What You Can Expect: Due to Death
Once we received the attached document, the spouse or estate must submit a copy of the death certificate and a copy of a state-issued ID. The new lessee will sign a change of name amendment. No credit check is required.
Let’s Get Going
To get started with either option, please complete the attached form and return it to us via email, phone, or fax:
Email: homesale@sunpower.com
Phone: 800-321-1770
Fax: (512) 684-0288
We appreciate your business and seek to make this transition as smooth as possible.
